item.description:
Inside the Corner Office: An Intimate Conversation with John Cvinar

Trail blazing executive, visionary entrepreneur, shrewd investor, consummate salesman. The journey for life sciences entrepreneurs continues in a program organized in the one-on-one interview style of the television series "Inside the Actor's Studio." At "Inside the Corner Office," we learn the craft of HOW to be a successful life sciences entrepreneur from John Cvinar. John is an experienced medical device corporate executive and entrepreneur instrumental in the formation of numerous new companies in a wide variety of clinical areas.

The scene will be set by Edward Ahn, Ph.D., founder of Angstrom Medica. Ed & John will explore John's career from corporate executive, entrepreneur, investor and M&A banker and will touch on topics such as:

  • Validating ideas and technology
  • Obtaining financing at various stages of the company's life
  • Building a top management team
  • Achieving regulatory clearances
  • Marketing and sales
  • Managing the board and investor relations
  • Exit strategy, exit execution

Healthcare & Life Sciences SIG Members: Free
Forum Members (not a member of the Healthcare SIG) $10
Non-Members:  $20

Students with valid ID: Free

Where & When

MIT Building E62, Room 262 

100 Memorial Drive

Cambridge, MA 02139

Wednesday, Feb 9, 2011

5:00 -  8:00PM
item.name: Inside the Corner Office: An Intimate Conversation with John Cvinar
